about_the_game:
This multiplayer first-person shooter is fast-paced, you'll die, but not be dead, you'll be a ghost, but you can be human again.
If you die and become a ghost, you are reborn outside the room, you can attack humans through the room walls, and if you succeed in killing a person, you can be reborn. But you don't have a weapon, so attack or hide quickly.
Of course, if you're still alive, watch out for ghosts behind you and try to save your life.
Although it's an FPS game, shooting isn't everything, so you might not have great shooting skills, but as long as you can move, you can use ghosts to your advantage to achieve things.

Features:
1. Fast and exciting.
If you are human, you have little time to rest and must constantly move, shoot and survive. If you are a ghost and want to be resurrected, you need to hurry up. It's time to attack humans.
2. Support single and multiplayer modes.
You can play with the AI or your friends or other players.
3. This mechanic is fun.
If you are a ghost, you can hide and attack people, you need to compete with other ghosts to become a person again. Of course, if you don't want to be resurrected, you can also choose to remain a ghost, just let others be ghosts too.
4. Items or skills.
Whether you're human or ghost, you can pick up specific items to gain special skills that help you survive or compete.
5. More combat modes.
There are many different modes of combat depending on the mechanics. For example, deathmatch or team deathmatch or survival mode.
6. Cartoon style graphics.

content_descriptors.notes: Including guns and shooting and ghost.
